titleStmt.title: An elegie on the death of Prince Henrie. By Sr William Alexander of Menstrie, gentleman of his Priuie Chamber
titleStmt.author: Stirling, William Alexander, Earl of, 1567 or 8-1640.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Andro Hart, and are to be solde at his shop, on the North-side of the high street, a litle beneath the Crosse,

notesStmt.note: Verses on the death of Henry Frederick, Prince of Wales.
Imprint date is bracketed on title page.
At foot of title page: With licence.
Reproduction of original in the British Library, London, England.

place.placeName: his shop, on the North-side of the high street, a litle beneath the Crosse
